inclusion.criterion: C. difficile infection defined as diarrhea (≥3 soft, loose or watery stools per day for at least 2 consecutive days or ≥8 soft or loose stools in 48 hours) and a positive stool test for C. difficile toxin
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: The presence of human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) infection with a CD4 count of less than 240
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old woman with C. difficile infection, febrile and hypotensive.
